dcterms:creator: K. Taira
A. G. Nair
S. L. Brunton
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of flow field data generated by direct numerical simulation (DNS) of two-dimensional decaying isotropic turbulence, which serves as a canonical turbulent flow.
dcterms:title: Two-dimensional decaying isotropic turbulence

dcterms:creator: N. B. Erichson
L. Mathelin
Z. Yao
S. L. Brunton
M. W. Mahoney
J. N. Kutz
dcterms:description: This dataset includes shallow neural networks for fluid flow reconstruction with limited sensors, applied to turbulent channel flow.
dcterms:title: Turbulent channel flow

dcterms:creator: B. Liu
J. Tang
H. Huang
X.-Y. Lu
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on deep learning methods for super-resolution reconstruction of turbulent flows, specifically isotropic turbulence.
dcterms:title: Isotropic turbulence

dcterms:creator: A. Güemes
S. Discetti
A. Ianiro
B. Sirmacek
H. Azizpour
R. Vinuesa
dcterms:description: This dataset includes turbulent velocity fields reconstructed from coarse wall measurements using deep learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Turbulent velocity fields

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
Z. Yang
B. Li
S. Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of velocity field data from turbulent channel flow, specifically focusing on predicting near-wall velocity using neural networks.
dcterms:title: Velocity field of turbulent channel flow

dcterms:creator: R. Onishi
D. Sugiyama
K. Matsuda
dcterms:description: This dataset includes temperature fields in an urban environment, focusing on super-resolution simulation for real-time prediction of urban micrometeorology.
dcterms:title: Temperature fields in urban environment

dcterms:creator: A. Güemes
S. Discetti
A. Ianiro
B. Sirmacek
H. Azizpour
R. Vinuesa
dcterms:description: This dataset includes wall-shear stresses and wall pressure data reconstructed from coarse wall measurements using deep learning.
dcterms:title: Wall-shear stresses and wall pressure
